word_mean: 使麻痹，使瘫痪：使…处于麻痹状态

sentence.Network_en: The snake uses its venom to stun or paralyze its victims.
sentence.Network_cn: 蛇用其毒液使受害者失去知觉或瘫痪.

sentence.Network_en: If unsolved, the problem will sooner or later paralyze our strategy and our foreign policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个问题如果不解决, 它迟早会使我们的战略和我们的对外政策陷于瘫痪.

sentence.Network_en: The soviet Union believes that it can demoralize Western Europe and paralyze us.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏联相信它能使西欧丧失斗志,麻痹我们.

list.abs: ...30/7,近身攻击,反隐形,它是野兽类中唯一有特殊魔法的兵种,但还是以常规攻击为主,魔法,麻痹刺击,paralyze sting,就是它的常规攻击,有时会使目标麻痹,蜘蛛网,Spider web,使一定范围内的敌人速度降低, <b.
He conceived of a robot that would help paralyzed patients ., 他构想了一种能够帮助瘫痪病人的机器人.
strict regulations that paralyze economic activity ., 阻碍经济活动的严格的规章制度.
舌麻 numbness of the tongue舌麻痹 paralyzed tongue舌痛 painful tongue

means.word_mean: 1. make powerless and unable to function;
2. cause to be paralyzed and immobile;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"半,类似,辅助"; 2. 表示"降落伞"; 3. 表示"在旁边"

stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 准军事性的,起军事辅助作用的
stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+military军事的→准军事的
para半,类似,辅助+political政治的→adj.半政治的
para半,类似,辅助+state国+al的→adj.半官方的
para在旁边+bol抛+ic的→adj.抛物线[状]的
para在旁边+noid=note注意→在旁边注意→怀疑的
para半,类似,辅助+legal法律的→辅助法律的
para半,类似,辅助+medic医师,实习医生→n.护理人员
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释
para降落伞+chut落下+e→n.降落伞
para降落伞+drop扔下→n.空投,空降

stems_affixes.value_cn: 伞兵部队, 空降部队
stems_affixes.word_buile: para降落伞+troop部队+s→n.伞兵部队, 空降部队
para在旁边+digm显示→在旁边显示给[别人]→示范
para在旁边+dox观点→观点边上有观点→矛盾
para在旁边+gon角→旁边顶尖人物→典范
para在旁边+log说话逻辑+ism现象,状态→在逻辑边上→不是逻辑
para旁边+sit坐+e→坐在在旁边[吃]→吃白食→寄生虫,食客
para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使瘫痪[麻痹];使丧失作用
stems_affixes.word_buile: para在旁边+lyze分开→旁边分开→瘫痪

Sentence.sentence: They are afraid the normal social order will be paralyzed.
What distinguishes a depression from a harsh recession is paralyzing fear - fear of the unknown so great that it causes consumers, businesses, and investors to retreat and panic.
The serious accident may leave Anna paralyzed.

sentences.en: A stroke paralyzed half his face.
The country was paralyzed by a series of strikes.
sentences.cn: 一系列的罢工使那个国家陷于瘫痪之中。
